41648.text: Fighting Alchemy or Savitar or aliens isn't something you just show up and try.
41648.original_text: Et voi lähteä soitellen sotaan avaruusolentoja vastaan.

274.text: You had to run your mouth in front of psychopaths, didn't you?

85.text: I mean, I talk a good game, but I very rarely tell people what I think to their face.
85.original_text: Soitan suutani, mutta sanon harvoin suorat sanat.

2303.text: And to top it off... I got the baddest system in all of London.
2303.original_text: Ja sokerina pohjalla, - minulla on Lontoon paras äänentoistojärjestelmä.

374.text: And last, as a kind of dessert, Anne Dettrey, our fashion editor.
374.original_text: Ja sokerina pohjalla Anne Dettrey, muotitoimittajamme.

3184.text: And last but not least... there is a fleet of limos outside... waiting to take us to... a strip club!
3184.original_text: Ja sokerina pohjalla - ulkona on limusiinikolonna - valmiina viemään meidät - strippiklubille!

5684.text: He's going to be so angry.

151.text: - [ Whimpering Laugh ] Oh, I'm in trouble.

1569.text: So unlike you... who seems to be completely comfortable just standing around like some fucking pussy... I decided to do something about it.
1569.original_text: Toisin kuin sinä, joka vain seisot tumput suorina - minä päätin tehdä jotain.

3678.text: What is everybody doing standing around here?

575.text: You can't expect me to do nothing.
575.original_text: En voi vain seisoa tumput suorina.

10894.text: The rate of infection for this patient is increasing every second you keep him open, not to mention the thousands of dollars you're wasting standing here doing nothing.
10894.original_text: lnfektion mahdollisuus kasvaa joka sekunti, jonka hän on auki. Lisäksi tuhlaat tuhansia dollareita, kun seisot siinä tumput suorina.

1012.text: - Roger may take a dim view of this...

1.text: And if you don't like that, you can just fire me.

12.text: OUR GALAXY TURNS ON ITS COSMIC SIBLINGS.
12.original_text: Se oli raju vaihe, jossa Linnunrata nielaisi lähimmät galaksit.

20.text: Could we get through with our phasers?

28156.text: I thought we'd be robbing banks by now, not some gas truck in the middle of nowhere.
28156.original_text: Luulin, että ryöstelisimme jo tässä vaiheessa pankkeja - emmekä bensarekkoja jossain Jumalan selän takana.

7446.text: I never thought I'd hear him say that. Safe to say this is when the mission went from the frying pan into the fire.
7446.original_text: Voimme varmaankin sanoa, että tässä vaiheessa menitte ojasta allikkoon.

51113.text: At what point did you begin to feel lost?
51113.original_text: Missä vaiheessa aloit tuntea olevasi hukassa?

43272.text: He's getting fitted for a halo.

49030.text: I think that's the point! I don't mean to be a contrarian, - but I'm enjoying this.
49030.original_text: En halua olla vastarannankiiski, mutta nautin tästä.

27028.text: No more dismissing anyone who disagrees.

2647.text: Some people get pissed off, saying we're taking over.

47037.text: Have I been sawing wood up there!

10834.text: No, no, I'll be sawing wood at 10:00.

323.text: When I got older, I wanted to bump into him and beat him up.
323.original_text: Vähän isompana toivoin törmääväni siihen ja vetäväni turpaan.

82.text: You better come back or else I'm gonna kick your ass.

1376.text: Maybe you could just give me a list of all of your exes so that I can at least know who's going to beat my ass into the ground next.
1376.original_text: Ehkä voisit antaa minulle listan kaikista existäsi jotta tietäisin edes kuka minua seuraavaksi vetää turpaan.

16113.text: I said, "Dead out, he was scared shitless.
16113.original_text: Sanoin, että vintti pimeni. Olit kauhuissasi.

163.text: - You don't have to draw me pictures.

301.text: Jeez, you gotta spell everything out for the cheerleader.

847.text: We should wait for Captain Teitel.

16023.text: Then give him an A for effort, Andy.

33108.text: A great ride, friend. But I have a feeling it's about over.
33108.original_text: Yritys hyvä kymmenen, mutta luulenpa että onnemme loppui.

10402.text: Win or lose, you are giving it your best shot.

1371.text: All of our living code breakers are absolutely stumped.
1371.original_text: Kaikki elävät koodinmurtajamme ovat äimän käkenä.

1489.text: Mum says so, but... looks more like her.

2506.text: You look like your mother. Let me help you.

2689.text: They say I look like her. - That's because you do.
